subject: Bugzilla, et. al. web servers back up
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Folks,

Sorry for the delay.  It's been a bit of a long week due to
some hardware issues.  New server is online now with an HA
mirror on the way.

So bugzilla, wiki, people, projects, news, viewcvs, & websvn
are back online now.





cheers, jerry

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNATURE-----
Version: GnuPG v1.4.6 (GNU/Linux)
Comment: Using GnuPG with Mozilla - http://enigmail.mozdev.org
